paragraphs.body: Cuisine in the ${link_0} can be divided into four major categories, which follow the division of the ${link_1}. However, regional variation in cuisine can be found, particularly in the ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: Cuisine in the World of Avatar can be divided into four major categories, which follow the division of the four nations. However, regional variation in cuisine can be found, particularly in the Earth Kingdom.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} cuisine consists of strictly vegetarian meals.
paragraphs.text: Air Nomad cuisine consists of strictly vegetarian meals.

paragraphs.body: Since the ${link_0} civilization was nearly wiped out at the beginning of the ${link_1}, little is known about the culinary traditions of the Air Nomads. However, the most defining characteristic of their cuisine was a strict vegetarianism. Air Nomads were also known for their sweets, such as fruit pies and custard tarts.
paragraphs.text: Since the Air Nomad civilization was nearly wiped out at the beginning of the Hundred Year War, little is known about the culinary traditions of the Air Nomads. However, the most defining characteristic of their cuisine was a strict vegetarianism. Air Nomads were also known for their sweets, such as fruit pies and custard tarts.

paragraphs.body: Little is known about the cooking style of the Air Nomads, except that they were skilled at baking and steaming.
paragraphs.text: Little is known about the cooking style of the Air Nomads, except that they were skilled at baking and steaming.
Stewed sea prunes are a Water Tribe delicacy.

paragraphs.body: Because of the barren land on which they live, the ${link_0} draw most of their food sources from the ocean. Staples of the cuisine include crab, ${link_1}, squid, ${link_2}, and seal jerky.
paragraphs.text: Because of the barren land on which they live, the Water Tribes draw most of their food sources from the ocean. Staples of the cuisine include crab, sea prunes, squid, seaweed, and seal jerky.

paragraphs.body: The main cooking styles of the Water Tribes appear to be boiling and stewing, as they lack the resources to make more elaborate dishes. Also, as they live in a colder part of the world, it is more practical to have foods like stews that warm the body and less practical to have things like salads. They also make jerky out of seal meat.

Also, as they live in a colder part of the world, it is more practical to have foods like stews that warm the body and less practical to have things like salads. They also make jerky out of seal meat.

paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} offers a variety of dishes, some of which were served to ${link_1} and ${link_2} while they visited ${link_3}'s home.
paragraphs.text: The Earth Kingdom offers a variety of dishes, some of which were served to Zuko and Iroh while they visited Song's home.

paragraphs.body: People in the Earth Kingdom grow and eat a wide variety of foods, including fruits, nuts, vegetables, rice, and ${link_0}. Meat and poultry from wild game and farms are also common. There are many regional variations in the types of food eaten, ranging from simpler village fare to the elaborate roasts, cakes, and other delicacies found in ${link_1}. While having a meal in Ba Sing Se, ${link_2} commented that the food tasted almost identical to Fire Nation food but less seasoned.
paragraphs.text: People in the Earth Kingdom grow and eat a wide variety of foods, including fruits, nuts, vegetables, rice, and tea. Meat and poultry from wild game and farms are also common. There are many regional variations in the types of food eaten, ranging from simpler village fare to the elaborate roasts, cakes, and other delicacies found in Ba Sing Se. While having a meal in Ba Sing Se, Zuko commented that the food tasted almost identical to Fire Nation food but less seasoned.

paragraphs.body: A huge variety of cooking methods are utilized in the Earth Kingdom. The Earth Kingdom is a massive continent with many variations in climate, which in turn effects food preparation. Boiling is used for rice and many vegetables. Fish is usually steamed, and meats are usually roasted. Baking is used extensively to make cakes, buns, and tarts. In the metal city of ${link_0}, they serve a fusion cuisine of gourmet and vegetarian entrées, most which use specially prepared ingredients such as kale.
paragraphs.text: A huge variety of cooking methods are utilized in the Earth Kingdom. The Earth Kingdom is a massive continent with many variations in climate, which in turn effects food preparation. Boiling is used for rice and many vegetables. Fish is usually steamed, and meats are usually roasted. Baking is used extensively to make cakes, buns, and tarts. In the metal city of Zaofu, they serve a fusion cuisine of gourmet and vegetarian entrées, most which use specially prepared ingredients such as kale.

paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} also carries a wide variety of food offerings, much like the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: The Fire Nation also carries a wide variety of food offerings, much like the Earth Kingdom.

paragraphs.body: The defining characteristic of ${link_0} cuisine is its spicy nature, closely resembling real-life Szechuan cuisine. Fire Nation citizens even put spices into many of their delicacies and treats. The Fire Nation uses a wide variety of grains, meats, and vegetables in cooking.
paragraphs.text: The defining characteristic of Fire Nation cuisine is its spicy nature, closely resembling real-life Szechuan cuisine. Fire Nation citizens even put spices into many of their delicacies and treats. The Fire Nation uses a wide variety of grains, meats, and vegetables in cooking.

paragraphs.body: As with the Earth Kingdom, many cooking methods are utilized in the Fire Nation. Regional variation is smaller, but the types of food available are still extensive. Boiling is used for rice and many vegetables. Fish is usually steamed, and meats roasted. Baking is used extensively to make cakes, buns, and tarts. The Fire Nation also has many snack foods, typically in the form of roasted bite-sized pieces with a large amount of spices. Chili and other spices are added to nearly all savory food.
paragraphs.text: As with the Earth Kingdom, many cooking methods are utilized in the Fire Nation. Regional variation is smaller, but the types of food available are still extensive. Boiling is used for rice and many vegetables. Fish is usually steamed, and meats roasted. Baking is used extensively to make cakes, buns, and tarts. The Fire Nation also has many snack foods, typically in the form of roasted bite-sized pieces with a large amount of spices. Chili and other spices are added to nearly all savory food.

paragraphs.body: Consumers in ${link_0} are able to enjoy a variety of foods from around the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Consumers in Republic City are able to enjoy a variety of foods from around the world.

paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} primarily offers commercially prepared foods, such as instant noodles and snack cakes, with the majority of its gourmet cuisine being food imported from the other nations.
paragraphs.text: The United Republic primarily offers commercially prepared foods, such as instant noodles and snack cakes, with the majority of its gourmet cuisine being food imported from the other nations.
